name: IDENTITY_POC_ID_HX
description: This table contains the system Master Person Index ID history for your Plan of Care. Each Plan of Care may have multiple Master Person Index IDs. A line number is used to identify each identification number for a Plan of Care.

columns.name: POC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MPI_HX
columns.description: The unique ID of the Master Patient Index (MPI) identifier before an audit event occurred.

columns.name: MPI_HX_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the audit event was logged for the identifier.

columns.name: MPI_HX_ID_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the ID type of the Master Patient Index (MPI) identifier.

columns.name: MPI_HX_ID_TYPE_ID_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.

columns.name: MPI_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user that triggered an audit event for the Master Patient Index (MPI) identifier.

columns.name: MPI_HX_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: MPI_HX_AUDIT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The audit event category ID for the plan of care that updated the identifier.

columns.name: MPI_HX_NEW_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Master Patient Index (MPI) identifier after an audit event has occurred.

columns.name: MPI_HX_DOTONE
columns.description: The internal Chronicles ID of the record for which this audit event was logged.

columns.name: MPI_HX_FROM_DATE
columns.description: The date the Master Patient Index (MPI) identifier is or was effective from.

columns.name: MPI_HX_TO_DATE
columns.description: The date the Master Patient Index (MPI) identifier is or was effective until.
